description:
The B in measure 180 played on (currently notated as on the 7th string) should be played on the 8th string due to the fingering pattern. Inversely, the same B in measure 182 (currently notated on the 1st string) should be played on the 7th string...again, fingering pattern. Both prevent a tendon-tweaking stretch...ESPECIALLY if have medium size hands or smaller and are playing on a 29.4" scale guitar. (As far as I can tell the same riff is correct in the rest of the tab)
(via editor)
title: In Death - Is Death
